items.title: Initiate Tournament: Brainstorm Major Plot Hooks for Aurathia
items.description: Create a multi-perspective tournament using code or tools to generate and vote on top 5 adventure starters, conflicts, and revolutions in the magical industrial solarpunk setting.

items.title: Initiate Tournament: Brainstorm Iconic NPCs and Factions
items.description: Tournament for generating diverse NPCs (heroes, villains, neutrals) and faction dynamics, with corruption twists. Select winners via simulated judging.

items.title: Initiate Tournament: Refine World Map and Regions
items.description: Generate variant maps or detail existing one; tournament for best region names, features, secrets (solarpunk vs. corrupt elements).

items.title: Initiate Tournament: Develop Magical Technology Trees
items.description: Brainstorm tech progressions: pure solar vs. tainted void hybrids. Tournament to rank viable inventions, balancing 1800s vibes with fantasy.

items.title: Initiate Tournament: Character Creation Options Expansion
items.description: Tournament for new races, classes, backgrounds tailored to solarpunk revolution theme.

items.title: Monitor and Retrieve Tournament Results
items.description: Periodically check tournament status, retrieve final files when complete, log to journal.

items.title: Synthesize Aurathia Core Documents
items.description: Compile tournament outputs into master files: lore.md, npcs.md, map.md, tech.md, characters.md. Create overview.
